tool_description: A GIF Engine which is one stop to get memes from various Sources.
name: Grestif
title: Grestif

api_list.name: Search Gifs
api_list.description: Search gives you instant access to our library of millions of GIFs and Stickers by entering a word or phrase. Get a json object containing a list of alternative search terms given a search term.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Mention your search query as string

api_list.name: Trending Search Words
api_list.description: Provides users a list of the most popular trending search terms. Get a json object containing a list of the current trending search terms.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://grestif.p.rapidapi.com/trendingSearches"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "grestif.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://grestif.p.rapidapi.com/trendingSearches"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "grestif.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Trending Gifs
api_list.description: Trending returns a list of the most relevant and engaging content each and every day. Get a json object containing a list of the current global trending GIFs. The trending stream is updated regularly throughout the day.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit describes the number of results you want to get
